system.unidentifiedDesc: The flask or vial holds a swirling and mysterious concoction inside.
system.description:
The effect is quite unusual. The user can permit others to merge their forms with the user's, including all equipment carried, as if all were gaseous. A maximum of seven other creatures can merge with the user. The merging cannot be forced; the user can, at will, prevent anyone from merging. A creature merged with the user can leave the merger by merely stepping out. No creature merged with another (including the user) can attack or cast a spell, but may speak. Damage to the user does not affect those merged.

It lasts for 7-12 turns (1d6+6), with the exact duration known only to the DM.

gm.notes: Due to the unusual nature of this potion's effect, it is up to the DM to keep track of the duration.
